fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Detect (Day): Guess a player's role. If correct you will be privately informed and they will take a Basic attack at the end of the night. 3 uses.
- Informed (Night): Select a player, learning their subalignment.
- Protection Order (Night): Select a player. Give them basic defense tonight. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Regain a use of Detect each time you use it to kill a member of the REF. Your uses of Detect can't go above 3.
